title: Last Year’s Ramadan Qur’an Competition
description: Our 2024 Ramadan Qur’an Competition was a major highlight, featuring dozens of participants across different levels. It was a spiritually uplifting and engaging event that celebrated the beauty of the Qur’an during the blessed month.

title: Qur’an Recitation Contest
description: An exciting opportunity for students to showcase their recitation skills! The Qur’an Recitation Contest is aimed at encouraging excellence in tajweed and fluency, while promoting healthy competition among learners.

title: Group Qur’an Memorization Class
description: Join our new group Qur’an memorization sessions at Al Qur’an Hub Academy. These classes are designed to support and motivate learners to memorize the Qur’an consistently through guided recitations and structured memorization plans in a group setting.

title: Giveaways and Rewards
description: We frequently hold giveaways for active and outstanding students, including data subscriptions, learning materials, and more—encouraging participation, dedication, and enthusiasm in our academy.
